From MODIS Analysis
From MODIS Analysis

•In alphabetical order. Roles: Alan Barr provided flux data, Guillaume Drolet conducted the MODIS analyses. Jan Gervin provided engineering analysis support. Forrest Hall provided overall conceptual framework. Fred Huemmrich provided helicopter analyses. Robert Knox developed Satellite requirements analysis. Alexi Lyapustin provided atmospheric radiative transfer requirements analysis. Hank Margolis provided access to fluxnet Canada data. Elizabeth Middleton coordinated the overall effort and provided biological consultation.
